name: New PAN Card (Form 49A)
description: Comprehensive guide to apply for a Permanent Account Number (PAN) for Indian Citizens.
eligibility: Must not already hold a PAN card
Must have valid Proof of Identity, Address, and Date of Birth

steps.title: Eligibility & Prerequisites
steps.description: Before starting, ensure you have a valid mobile number linked to Aadhaar (for paperless e-KYC).
steps.details: You need Aadhaar linked mobile for OTP. If not, you must send physical documents.

steps.title: Choose Portal
steps.description: Visit the official NSDL (Protean) or UTIITSL website.
steps.details: Select 'New PAN - Indian Citizen (Form 49A)' from the dropdown.

steps.title: Fill Personal Details
steps.description: Enter your Name, Date of Birth, and Email exactly as per Aadhaar.
steps.details: Mistake Warning: Initials must match Aadhaar. Do not use prefixes like Mr./Ms. in the name fields if not required.

steps.title: Choose Mode
steps.details: Digital Mode: Sign using Aadhaar OTP. Physical Mode: Print, Sign, and Post documents.
